column2: Revenue from Windows Commercial products and cloud
services, comprising volume licensing of the Windows operating
system, Windows cloud services, and other Windows
Revenue from Devices, including Surface, HoloLens, and PC
Revenue from Xbox content and services, comprising first- and
third-party content (including games and in-game content),
Xbox Game Pass and other subscriptions, Xbox Cloud Gaming,
advertising, third-party disc royalties, and other cloud services
